info.title: Shopping Cart
info.description: This API is a basic shopping cart that allows users to add, delete, update, and view products to their cart. This can also go beyond by letting users place order for products.
info.summary: A basic shopping cart project that allows users to add products to cart.

post.description: This endpoint creates different category for differnt products

example-1.CategoryDescription: They want to be able to see exactly what your product looks like, what its made of, the dimensions, what others think of it, and ultimately whether it meets their needs.

value.CategoryDescription: They want to be able to see exactly what your product looks like, what its made of, the dimensions, what others think of it, and ultimately whether it meets their needs.

ProductCount.description: Displays the number of products in this category

ViewRecord.description: Link to view this particular category

ViewProducts.description: Link to view all products in this category

EditRecord.description: Link to be used to edit this particular category

DeleteRecord.description: Link to delete a particular category
